reviews.review_msg: Second time taking a course with Dr. Connolly and yet again succeeded my expectations! She's so understanding and insightful, and since this course is a seminar class, the class discussion was interesting and made us feel comfortable sharing our thoughts on the content! I'd recommend her, she's so sweet!

I Had him for My Gang Violence seminar class. We had journal articles for our readings. His lectures were really interesting. We were expected to have questions on our readings but he also had us submit our opinions by email in case people were shy. A good section of our lecture was class discussion, which I found really helped me learn the topics.
